snippet: Finger Lakes Extra Virgin Grape Seed Oil has a flavor more akin to olive oil.
abstract: Finger Lakes Extra Virgin Grape Seed Oil, cold-pressed from the winemaking leftovers of about 25 wineries in the Finger Lakes region, is new grape seed oil with real personality and is available online.
lead_paragraph: Finger Lakes Extra Virgin Grape Seed Oil has a flavor more akin to olive oil.

headline.seo: Finger Lakes Grape Seed Oil Has Many Uses
headline.main: In Leftovers of Winemaking, a Versatile Oil
headline.print_headline: In Leftovers Of Winemaking, A Versatile Oil
